title: Ryanair Boeing jet with 184 on board catches fire in Italy before take-off
content: ​A Ryanair flight carrying 184 passengers had to abort its take off after flames were shooting from the left engine. The Boeing was immediately evacuated at Italy's Aeroporti di Puglia airport in Brindisi. No injuries were reported. The flight was due to head to Turin at around 8.35am when passengers noticed a "strong flame" from underneath the wing of the Boeing 737-800 during taxiing.
summary: ​A Ryanair flight carrying 184 passengers had to abort its take off after flames were shooting from the left engine. The Boeing was immediately evacuated at Italy's Aeroporti di Puglia airport in Brindisi. No injuries were reported. The flight was due to head to Turin at around 8.35am when passengers noticed a "strong flame" from underneath the wing of the Boeing 737-800 during taxiing.

title: Nate Silver says Kennedy Jr is a bigger boost than Taylor Swift because...
content: In the 2024 election, major endorsements included Taylor Swift and Oprah Winfrey supporting Kamala Harris. However, pollster Nate Silver deemed RFK Jr’s endorsement of Donald Trump more impactful, coinciding with a dip in Harris's poll numbers. While Swift's endorsement drove voter registration, it had minimal influence on voter support, according to an ABC News poll.
summary: In the 2024 election, major endorsements included Taylor Swift and Oprah Winfrey supporting Kamala Harris. However, pollster Nate Silver deemed RFK Jr’s endorsement of Donald Trump more impactful, coinciding with a dip in Harris's poll numbers. While Swift's endorsement drove voter registration, it had minimal influence on voter support, according to an ABC News poll.

title: Emirates cancels flights to Iraq, Iran and Jordan amid regional unrest
content: Emirates has canceled flights to Iraq, Iran, and Jordan from October 3 to 5 due to regional unrest following Iran's missile strike on Israel. Other airlines like Lufthansa have also suspended flights to affected areas, highlighting the heightened tensions in the region.
summary: Emirates has canceled flights to Iraq, Iran, and Jordan from October 3 to 5 due to regional unrest following Iran's missile strike on Israel. Other airlines like Lufthansa have also suspended flights to affected areas, highlighting the heightened tensions in the region.

title: Diddy's celeb guests knew when to leave the party; 'what happened before 2 am...'
content: Sean "Diddy" Combs' parties were infamous for their wild late-night activities, with Hollywood A-listers often leaving before things got crazier. ​They had a signal that told them to make an exit and it was girls shedding their clothes. "Girls would start to lose their clothes. That was the signal for people to leave," a report said citing sources.
summary: Sean "Diddy" Combs' parties were infamous for their wild late-night activities, with Hollywood A-listers often leaving before things got crazier. ​They had a signal that told them to make an exit and it was girls shedding their clothes. "Girls would start to lose their clothes. That was the signal for people to leave," a report said citing sources.

San Diego zoo’s male flamingo couple becomes first-time dads
content: Two male lesser flamingos at San Diego Zoo Safari Park have become first-time dads after hatching an egg together. The pair, both in their 40s, excel at brooding and feeding their chick with crop milk. Same-sex co-parenting is increasingly observed in birds like penguins and vultures in zoos worldwide.
summary: Two male lesser flamingos at San Diego Zoo Safari Park have become first-time dads after hatching an egg together. The pair, both in their 40s, excel at brooding and feeding their chick with crop milk. Same-sex co-parenting is increasingly observed in birds like penguins and vultures in zoos worldwide.

title: Here's what billionaire Mark Cuban bought in drunk state after selling his first company and no you can't buy it anymore
content: Billionaire Mark Cuban celebrated his first startup's sale by purchasing a lifetime flight pass from American Airlines for $125,000. The AAirpass allowed unlimited first-class travel, which Cuban used generously until the program was discontinued. Years later, he made another notable splurge, buying a $40 million jet after selling Broadcast.com to Yahoo for $5.7 billion.
summary: Billionaire Mark Cuban celebrated his first startup's sale by purchasing a lifetime flight pass from American Airlines for $125,000. The AAirpass allowed unlimited first-class travel, which Cuban used generously until the program was discontinued. Years later, he made another notable splurge, buying a $40 million jet after selling Broadcast.com to Yahoo for $5.7 billion.

title: 'Everyone go thank Usha': Viral post credits JD Vance's 'Indian wife' for his impressive debate performance
content: JD Vance's wife, Usha Chilukuri Vance, is credited with significantly aiding his performance in the vice-presidential debate against Tim Walz. Her background in law and debate has provided a strategic advantage. Polls show a tight race, with Vance receiving a boost in favorability.
summary: JD Vance's wife, Usha Chilukuri Vance, is credited with significantly aiding his performance in the vice-presidential debate against Tim Walz. Her background in law and debate has provided a strategic advantage. Polls show a tight race, with Vance receiving a boost in favorability.

title: Hurricane Helene: Biden says climate change deniers 'must be brain dead'
content: President Joe Biden urged unity in the aftermath of Hurricane Helene, emphasizing the urgent need for recovery efforts and acknowledging climate change's role. He announced the need for additional Congress-approved funding. Criticism arose from both sides, with Biden's comments on climate skeptics and Vice President Kamala Harris's response also under scrutiny.
summary: President Joe Biden urged unity in the aftermath of Hurricane Helene, emphasizing the urgent need for recovery efforts and acknowledging climate change's role. He announced the need for additional Congress-approved funding. Criticism arose from both sides, with Biden's comments on climate skeptics and Vice President Kamala Harris's response also under scrutiny.

title: Virginia Republican nominee blames Drag queen for low military recruitment numbers
content: Republican nominee Hung Cao criticised the use of drag queens in Navy recruitment, attributing poor recruitment numbers to this strategy, and called for a focus on 'alpha males and females.' Democratic Senator Tim Kaine dismissed this view as a distraction from real issues like engaging diverse communities.
summary: Republican nominee Hung Cao criticised the use of drag queens in Navy recruitment, attributing poor recruitment numbers to this strategy, and called for a focus on 'alpha males and females.' Democratic Senator Tim Kaine dismissed this view as a distraction from real issues like engaging diverse communities.

title: Why is Trump's Twitter handle thanking everyone
content: As Election Day nears, Donald Trump leverages social media platform X to energize voters in North Carolina with automated, personalized responses, stressing the importance of planning to vote early or on November 5. The tactic generates considerable engagement and interaction among users.
summary: As Election Day nears, Donald Trump leverages social media platform X to energize voters in North Carolina with automated, personalized responses, stressing the importance of planning to vote early or on November 5. The tactic generates considerable engagement and interaction among users.

title: 6-year-old guest at Diddy's 1999 party recalls wild experience
content: Justin Litovsky who was a guest when he was 6-years-old recalls his unexpected experience at Sean “Diddy” Combs’ infamous 1999 White Party, filled with adult themes, leaving his family uncomfortable. The event recently resurfaced following Diddy's arrest on racketeering and sex trafficking charges, highlighting lingering questions about that notable night.
summary: Justin Litovsky who was a guest when he was 6-years-old recalls his unexpected experience at Sean “Diddy” Combs’ infamous 1999 White Party, filled with adult themes, leaving his family uncomfortable. The event recently resurfaced following Diddy's arrest on racketeering and sex trafficking charges, highlighting lingering questions about that notable night.

title: Harris backs striking port workers, criticises Trump over workers' rights
content: Vice President Kamala Harris backs the protesting longshoremen, emphasizing the need for fair wages and anti-automation measures. She criticizes Trump for undermining workers' rights while highlighting the Biden administration's support. The strike, led by the International Longshoremen’s Association, demands higher wages and halting port automation, impacting the global economy significantly.
summary: Vice President Kamala Harris backs the protesting longshoremen, emphasizing the need for fair wages and anti-automation measures. She criticizes Trump for undermining workers' rights while highlighting the Biden administration's support. The strike, led by the International Longshoremen’s Association, demands higher wages and halting port automation, impacting the global economy significantly.

title: Prince Harry opens up on trip without Meghan Markle: 'When people from top start ...'
content: Prince Harry urged leaders to listen to youth voices for better impact during his South African visit for his charity Sentebale. Alongside Prince Seeiso, Harry highlighted the charity’s progress and the importance of engaging with young people to create a lasting legacy.
summary: Prince Harry urged leaders to listen to youth voices for better impact during his South African visit for his charity Sentebale. Alongside Prince Seeiso, Harry highlighted the charity’s progress and the importance of engaging with young people to create a lasting legacy.

title: Israel-Hezbollah conflict: How hard liners influence Netanyahu govt
content: Three women were arrested at an Israeli synagogue for advocating a hostage deal, highlighting a perceived crackdown on dissent by Prime Minister Netanyahu's government. National Security Minister Itamar Ben Gvir, known for tough policies and controversial actions, faces criticism for threatening Israeli democracy. Protests have emerged amid the ongoing conflict with Gaza and tensions with Hezbollah.
summary: Three women were arrested at an Israeli synagogue for advocating a hostage deal, highlighting a perceived crackdown on dissent by Prime Minister Netanyahu's government. National Security Minister Itamar Ben Gvir, known for tough policies and controversial actions, faces criticism for threatening Israeli democracy. Protests have emerged amid the ongoing conflict with Gaza and tensions with Hezbollah.

title: Bangladesh government recalls 5 envoys, including from India
content: Bangladesh's interim government, led by Muhammad Yunus, has recalled envoys from key international posts, including India and the UN, following significant political upheaval. The recalls follow the resignation and escape of Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina to India, amid violence claiming over 700 lives.
summary: Bangladesh's interim government, led by Muhammad Yunus, has recalled envoys from key international posts, including India and the UN, following significant political upheaval. The recalls follow the resignation and escape of Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina to India, amid violence claiming over 700 lives.

title: 'House of horrors': 6-month-old baby almost eaten alive by rats in Indiana; father sentenced to 16 years in prison
content: An Indiana father has been sentenced to over 16 years in prison for severe neglect after his infant son was found with more than 50 rat bites and severe injuries. The mother has taken a plea deal, while the aunt received probation for the incident.
summary: An Indiana father has been sentenced to over 16 years in prison for severe neglect after his infant son was found with more than 50 rat bites and severe injuries. The mother has taken a plea deal, while the aunt received probation for the incident.

title: Trump raises $160 million in Sept as fundraising ahead of election
content: Donald Trump's campaign raised over $160 million in September, boosting his cash reserve to $283 million. Kamala Harris, the Democratic Presidential nominee, outperformed Trump in August with $361 million and recently raised $55 million over a weekend as both parties gear up for a tight race.
summary: Donald Trump's campaign raised over $160 million in September, boosting his cash reserve to $283 million. Kamala Harris, the Democratic Presidential nominee, outperformed Trump in August with $361 million and recently raised $55 million over a weekend as both parties gear up for a tight race.

title: Suspected Marburg virus case in Germany traced back to Africa
content: A medical student and his girlfriend were taken to a specialist clinic for tests after showing flu-like symptoms on a train in Hamburg. They had returned from Rwanda, which is experiencing a Marburg virus outbreak. The station's platform was closed briefly. Marburg virus can cause severe hemorrhagic fever and is highly lethal.
summary: A medical student and his girlfriend were taken to a specialist clinic for tests after showing flu-like symptoms on a train in Hamburg. They had returned from Rwanda, which is experiencing a Marburg virus outbreak. The station's platform was closed briefly. Marburg virus can cause severe hemorrhagic fever and is highly lethal.
